dt.t: To counteract the imbalances created by cycling, plus improve your posture, flexibility and overall performance, [Jeb] Stewart recommends concentrating on the deep abdominal muscles … as well as the hips, {wi}glutes{/wi} and shoulder girdle.
Run, run, run at high altitudes (to improve oxygen use) and over hills (great for {wi}glutes{/wi}).

shortdef: a large muscle of the buttocks : gluteus —usually plural
